name: Range Master: Sniper Academy
description:
Join the BEST ONLINE MULTIPLAYER SHOOTING RANGE EXPERIENCE and challenge players worldwide.

Are you ready to become the Range Master? Choose your weapon, aim and shoot!
Fun for everyone, easy to control, difficult to master. Can you hit the bullseye?

CLIMB THE WORLD LEADERBOARD
• 3 different weapon categories: Iron sight, Acog 4x, Telescopic.
• Short, medium and long range rifles
• 30 different weapons.
• 100+ weapon upgrades.
• 5 stats per weapon - each weapon is unique.
• 15 different sceneries.
• 30+ different targets.

REALISTIC 3D GRAPHICS
• Fire your weapons in exotic locations around the world.
• Settings with photorealistic graphics based on real locations.
• Endless weapon customization: can you build the perfect weapon?

MANY DIFFERENT GAME MODES
• Daily tournaments and great rewards.
• Online Multiplayer: head to head challenges to become the best shooter.
• Training mode: learn how to become a pro sniper.
• Accumulate XP and level up by playing multiplayer matches
• Unlock higher-tier weapons.

Problems or feedback: support@reludo.com
